member.name: F:Syncfusion.ListView.XForms.DragDropController.startItemIndex
member.summary: It's used to indicates the start drag item index when dragging is started.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.ListView.XForms.DragDropController.endItemIndex
member.summary: It's used to indicates the end drag item index being dragging. And the item is reordered after dropped by using this index.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.ListView.XForms.DragDropController.previousItemIndex
member.summary: It's used to indicates that previous item index when after layout while perform dragging. The layout is perform while dragging using this index.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.ListView.XForms.DragDropController.initialYPosition
member.summary: It's used to indicates that initial position drag item for vertical orientation. By using this index, drag position will calculated while perform dragging.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.ListView.XForms.DragDropController.initialXPosition
member.summary: It's used to indicates that initial position drag item for horizontal orientation. By using this index, drag position will calculated while perform dragging.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.ListView.XForms.DragDropController.isInLayout
member.summary: It's used to indicates that whether item is in layout or not. Since when perform the drag and drop faster, layout will happened animated and that time the dragging will ended. So by using this flag it will hold until layout completed.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.ListView.XForms.DragDropController.isMovingUpOrLeft
member.summary: It's used to indicates that dragging direction for find next item index. By using this index, find the next or previous item and layout it.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.ListView.XForms.DragDropController.dragViewItem
member.summary: It's used to store the drag item view for layout it while perform dragging. Since we are layout the item which is direct children of VisualContainer.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.ListView.XForms.DragDropController.actualRect
member.summary: It's used to store the actual drag item rectangle value. It will used to reset the drag item if drop cancelled or drop in the same position.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.ListView.XForms.DragDropController.items
member.summary: It's used to hold the display items. Based on these collection find the previous or next item and layout it while perform dragging.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.ListView.XForms.DragDropController.dragItemSize
member.summary: It's used to store the drag line size and used to reset the size when auto scrolling is completed. Then only the actual drag item will be moved into dropped position.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.ListView.XForms.DragDropController.needtoStopDragging
member.summary: It's used to indicates whether item is in dragging or not and to reset the drag end after layout is completed. Since drag item is in layout while perform drag and drop faster.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.ListView.XForms.DragDropController.dropPosition
member.summary: It's used to hold the drop item position. Since while drag and drop faster the layout will happened even drag stopped. So until layout completed, we have hold the drop and then call the dropping after complete. So for that we need to maintain the position. Store the drop position in dragging until drop since if we calculate the position in renderer it will return last layout position from view even if we dropped in out of view. It will update in drag start also since we have to pass the drag start position if not dragging while drop the item.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.ListView.XForms.VisualContainer.NeedToForceLayout
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether need to force layout or not. XAMARIN-9956 - Since unable to find out child views size changes from PCL, need to refresh the layout from renderer projects. To skip the unwanted layout process, used this property. This has been set as false from OnMeasure and OnSizeAllocated method. And it will be set as true from the related method from renderer projects to refresh the layout only when OnMeasure method(Android) or LayoutUpdated event(UWP) alone called and OnSizeAllocated is not getting invoked automatically.

member.name: E:Syncfusion.ListView.XForms.SfListView.SelectionChanging
member.summary: Occurs while selecting an item at the execution time.
member.remarks: The event is a cancelable event and can be canceled by handling the event and setting the Cancel property to true. However, if the event is canceled, the selection process for the selected gets cancelled.

member.name: E:Syncfusion.ListView.XForms.SfListView.GroupExpanding
member.summary: Occurs when a group is being expanded.
member.remarks: The event is a cancelable event and can be canceled by handling the event and setting the Cancel property to true. However, if the event is canceled, the group expanding process for the tapped gets cancelled. Also, we can customize the group being expanded through event argument.

member.name: E:Syncfusion.ListView.XForms.SfListView.GroupCollapsing
member.summary: Occurs when a group is being collapsed.
member.remarks: The event is a cancelable event and can be canceled by handling the event and setting the Cancel property to true. However, if the event is canceled, the group collapsing process for the tapped gets cancelled. Also, we can customize the group being collapsed through event argument.

member.name: E:Syncfusion.ListView.XForms.SfListView.GroupExpanded
member.summary: Occurs when a group is expanded.
member.remarks: This event occurs after the event if that event is not canceled.

member.name: E:Syncfusion.ListView.XForms.SfListView.GroupCollapsed
member.summary: Occurs when a group is collapsed.
member.remarks: This event occurs after the event if that event is not canceled.

member.name: E:Syncfusion.ListView.XForms.SfListView.SwipeStarted
member.summary: Occurs when the swipe offset changes from its initial value.
member.remarks: The event is a cancelable event and can be canceled by handling the event and setting the Cancel property to true. However, if the event is canceled, the swipe action for that particular item gets cancelled.

member.name: E:Syncfusion.ListView.XForms.SfListView.Swiping
member.summary: Occurs while swiping an item is in progress.
member.remarks: The event can be handled by defining the Handled property in the argument to true which holds the current swipe offset value for the swiped item until the event is raised.

member.name: E:Syncfusion.ListView.XForms.SfListView.SwipeEnded
member.summary: Occurs when the swipe action is completed for an item.

member.name: E:Syncfusion.ListView.XForms.SfListView.SwipeReset
member.summary: Occurs when the swiped item gets reset.
member.remarks: The action can be canceled by setting the Cancel property of the to true.

member.name: E:Syncfusion.ListView.XForms.SfListView.QueryItemSize
member.summary: Occurs whenever an item comes into view and query the item size.
member.remarks: We can define whether the specified size can be set to the item or not by handling the event. When the Handled property in the argument is false, the decided size will not be set to the item.

member.name: E:Syncfusion.ListView.XForms.SfListView.ItemDragging
member.summary: This event occurs while perform the item drag and drop operation and denotes the drag action by .

member.name: E:Syncfusion.ListView.XForms.SfListView.ScrollStateChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the 's scrolling state changed.

member.name: E:Syncfusion.ListView.XForms.SfListView.Loaded
member.summary: Occurs when a is loaded for the first time.
member.remarks: This event occurs only once when a is loaded in view for the first time. Any properties set in this event call back will lead to an additional refresh call when the is loaded.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.ListView.XForms.SfListView.LoadMoreOption
member.summary:
Gets or sets the option which determines how the load more items support will be behaved. If it is , then load more support will not be enabled. This is the default value.
If it is , then it will automatically execute the when list view reaches it scroll end.
If it is , then it displays load more button when end reached and execute the when tap on button. For , is not supported. For , is not supported.

example.code: SfListView listView = new SfListView(); listView.LoadMoreOption = LoadMoreOption.Manual;

member.name: P:Syncfusion.ListView.XForms.SfListView.LoadMorePosition
member.summary:
Gets or sets the position which determines where the load more item should be positioned. If it is , then load more item will be added on top of the list.
If it is and , the load more item will be in the left corner of the list. If it is , then load more item will be added at bottom of the list. This is the default value.
If it is and , the load more item will be in the right corner of the list.

example.code: SfListView listView = new SfListView(); listView.LoadMorePosition = LoadMorePosition.Top;
